title: Mobile LMS-Based Foundational Islamic Worship Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Islamic culture and proficiency in basic digital device usage
context.additional_context: Providing customized content considering learners' religious backgrounds, integrated with real-time interaction and mobile learning systems

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correct procedures for performing the five obligatory prayers (Salat) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can practice pre-worship preparations (e.g., Wudu, Tayammum) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can use a mobile LMS to record and manage weekly prayer performance with 100% completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
